pullrequest.title: Model submission for X1 sensor configuration 1 from Team Explorer

content.raw: All the cameras are identical and they have the same characteristics as the X1-X4 QVGA RGBD cameras. I have changed the near/far clip parameters from what was submitted to match those in the X1-X4 configs because setting separate clip parameters for images and point clouds is currently not supported in ign-gazebo. The 3D medium range lidar has a different range (75m) than the "medium" ones in X1-X4 configurations, otherwise, it is the same.
content.html: All the cameras are identical and they have the same characteristics as the X1-X4 QVGA RGBD cameras. I have changed the near/far clip parameters from what was submitted to match those in the X1-X4 configs because setting separate clip parameters for images and point clouds is currently not supported in ign-gazebo. The 3D medium range lidar has a different range (75m) than the "medium" ones in X1-X4 configurations, otherwise, it is the same.
